channel.title: Error Adding NCP
channel.description:
I tried to put this code.....
[code] spawn = 100 3254 3223 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3260 3222 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3264 3234 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3262 3244 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3247 3246 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3244 3246 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3244 3242 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3250 3238 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3246 3232 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3255 3236 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3251 3226 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin spawn = 100 3256 3243 0 0 0 0 0 1 Goblin [/code]
to my autospawn.cfg and I got an error message. I took it out and then my server worked fin. What is wrong with the code?
